website_summaries.verdict: A durable and waterproof deck bench that stands out for its large storage capacity.
cons: Some buyers say that this option arrived with defective or broken parts, while others found that it was missing the hardware to assemble it

customer_reviews.title: Went together quite easily, did it all by myself in like 15-20 ...
customer_reviews.text: Went together quite easily, did it all by myself in like 15-20 mins and looks great, really roomy with more then enough room for all of my outdoor pillows. We'll see how well it does after the rain they've been calling for this weekend hits. Ha! **Update** Bench is still in great shape! It's been a year now and I'm impressed! Left it out all winter and still in great condition. It rains here alot and my out door cushions are never wet when I take them out! 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: jolly09

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Right out of box as installing the top part had broken or defective location for screw to hold the metal piece. Can't return whole item as it's put together which is supposed to just snap but was difficult. Finding the defective part was disappointing. Tried to get it from manufacturer but so far nothing. Amazon made me msg manufacturer and they ignoring me.. bad deal don't buy it. They were won't send bad broken parts. Not Even a response from manufacturer when I used Amazon link to email them.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have asked for a better storage solution for my deck.
customer_reviews.text: Impeccably packaged in the box. This was very easy to put together. The parts mostly were fitted to snap together. Only ten screws and two automatic hydraulic like openers. It doesn't get any better. Very pleasantly surprised this was much larger than I expected. Will have no problems storing patio cushions and many other patio items. Nice quality that will give me many years of service. You will not be disappointed and well worth it's price.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Would give it zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why Keter changed their manufacturing, but they have. I have purchased several of their storage boxes over the years and this is certainly not the same quality of the their other products. the edges are not cleaned up and sharp. The panels do not fit snuggly and keeps the lid from closing properly. Over all, it is junk. I am returning. I will purchase a Suncast. They still produce a quality product. And I did call their customer service. The person I spoke with could have cared less!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nat in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son put this together for me and had no trouble at all. It has struts on the lid so it is very easy to lift and close and won't fall on kids fingers. You can put a padlock on the front with the brackets it has, if you want. Very durable material. My son was playing around and got inside it to show me how much room there is in it (he's 6' 1" tall) and the bottom did not break with his weight. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: preciousad

customer_reviews.title: Great Deck Box for Outdoor Storage
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews of different brands I decided on the Keter because it keeps water out. It's true! We have had it for about a month in Southwest Florida, where we get plenty of rain and no water has ever penetrated the box. It looks great and is easy to put together in about a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for replacement part R6 !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am still waiting for a replacement part which arrived cracked. The instructions inside the box say to contact KETER directly. I am still waiting and weeks have passed. I started to put it together anyway because I need the storage outside so badly, but it is not easy to assemble without help. I dont know how people are saying its a snap to put together. Keter has not responded to my last two calls...very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Fmbead

customer_reviews.title: This product took 4 weeks to be delivered. During ...
customer_reviews.text: This product took 4 weeks to be delivered. During assembly, my husband discovered it had no hardware . He immediately tried to call, was required to leave a message. Because he got no response, he called another listed number. After several days and multiple calls, he called again today and finally got a response, and was told the hardware would take 10-15 days to be delivered. This is totally unacceptable! We could have bought a similar product locally and have had the use of it during this time. I would definitely not order anything from Keter again.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time. This is not a quality item.
customer_reviews.text: I received the Keter Plastic Deck Storage Container about a week ago. It arrived with several broken parts. Repacked it, sent it back and ordered a replacement. Received the replacement, Keter Plastic Deck Storage Box, this evening and behold, this one had broken parts as well. Never ordering a Keter product again. I do not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: barefoot

customer_reviews.title: Great Construction...but Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars, but a small end cap was missing from the lid, so I contacted the manufacturer to get a replacement parts, and 2 weeks later, I haven't even received a confirmation email...and part is still missing. The overall construction of the box is GREAT and It was very easy to put together. Also, the toll free number that is listed all over the literature that came with the box is no good. The phone is never answered...but I did find a customer service link on their website...but still no answer. Overall, very happy with the box...just wish it was ALL here.
customer_reviews.author: GodsMan74

customer_reviews.title: Great deck box
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Borneo deck box. Very impressed with packaging. Instructions, screws, and accessories were well packaged and complete! The box took me about an hour to get together-I read the instructions thoroughly, separate parts and check fit before tightening...in other words, I take my time. Assembly was a snap(literally). No screws or tools are needed except for hydraulic door lifters. Can’t give it a perfect score-the door latches don’t close “flush”. Other than that, a 5 3/4 star! Will follow up when I can check how it responds to weather(supposed to storm this week) UPDATE: came through storm and contents stayed dry. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Will Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Extra large, all purpose patio storage
customer_reviews.text: Very big! This will hold a lot of things or many cushions. With two people, it was easy to put together. My only complaint is that it does look plastic and some of the dark color was rubbed off, making it look like there were scratches on it. It wasn’t enough to bother me, since my cats enjoy walking across, and sleeping on it, it will just be a matter of time before they do a little damage. It is too soon to tell how how waterproof it is since we haven’t had any driving rain under our covered patio.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity
customer_reviews.text: This storage bench was fairly easy to assemble, with some minor challenges. The sides do not completely align creating some gaps in the front, so I am not sure how weatherproof it will be in the long run. So far so good, though, even though it's been raining a lot. It fits all my cushions (4 chair cushions with back pieces) and still plenty of room left. It looks nice in my deck, good value overall.
customer_reviews.author: EH1

customer_reviews.title: Same old problem with Keter - the lid
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could find an alternative to Keter out door boxes. This is the 3rd one on 10 years & always the same problem the lid buckles after a week. We even had the one with metal strengtheners in the lid - still buckled. Is it they are weathering since they must be injection molded I assume & as soon astray see the sun or the cold they buckle. I have no idea why bit they always do. We just accept they will not ever have a lid that fits.
customer_reviews.author: T. McKay

customer_reviews.title: vey flimsy
customer_reviews.text: the bottom of this deck box is so flimsy it is difficult to attach, if I still had my box I would return it. If I can attach the bottom I will have to get reinforcement to hold the things I planned to store otherwise it will be a loss to me
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The box didn't have any hardware in it. I called the 1800 number and I was in hold for 10 minutes, when the representative picked up the call was dropped.
customer_reviews.author: pan0825

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage trunk!
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations for this unit, after all it was less expensive than the mediocre storage containers at lowes, and that includes free delivery! But boy, was I wrong! This baby is HUGE and it has hydraulic hinges so it stays open when you open the lid and closes smoothly. It also has a clasp for using a lock on the front if needed, its very light weight and easily assembled. I bought it for storing my misc gardening supplies, it fit all of them a few other odds and ends. I use it on a covered porch, but it looks pretty weather proof. Will definitely be buying another for cushion storage later.
customer_reviews.author: Jen1170

customer_reviews.title: A good box at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: The box came a day early and was well packaged. Assembly was easy for me, but I am an experienced home repair guy. You had to be careful to make sure all of the pieces snapped together completely. It took me about 20 minutes total but I went slowly while following the instructions. The finished box is sturdy and attractive. The lid works especially well with pneumatic cylinders provided. All things considered it is a good value for an attractive outdoor storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald F.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and big, and keeps everything dry
customer_reviews.text: Love this box, it stores all my outside cusions and pillows and keeps them dry, I even put a towel in there last weekend, and last night we had 2+ inchs of rain and some down pours, this morning I opened it and everything was dry. I only gave it 4 stars because there was a missing top cap for the side piece (but the box was not opened or damaged and one cracked side piece) Amazon was fantastic at getting me a replacement and return label for the damaged one. If there would have been no damage or an opened box that showed how it could have gotten damaged, I would give this item 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BELGM

customer_reviews.title: So close to being perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt want to give it only 3 stars but I dont think it quite reaches a 4. The set up was super easy all the way until I had to put on the last panel. It just WONT click in, I believe it to be warped or broken. So right now I have this sitting in my backyard with one panel not all the way assembled. I didnt want to go through the hassle of returning and shipping this back to Amazon so I guess im stuck with it. If I didnt have issues with this one side then this would easily get 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent, holds a huge amount
customer_reviews.text: This deck box is huge. I use it by the pool and it holds: snorkels, goggles, towels, pool toys such as basketball hoop and balls, all my chair cushions (4) and even the chaise lounge cushions (2 ) (when folded), all at one time. It has really de-cluttered my pool area nicely. We have had quite a few heavy rains and everything stays perfectly dry. The inside stays cool enough that I've started leaving the sunscreen lotions in it also. It snaps together very easy and isn't very heavy to move. This was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Tiellady

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed materials and assembles just as poorly. they include 4 whole screws to assemble it. Min. of 8 needed plus plus. Material is thin and will not stop water. Lid was "warped" an would not close to the latch. Instructions tell you to call them prior to return if a problem. Calling them for help is a waste of time. Sooooo sorry I bought it. Thought this brand was going to be alot better.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Wadzinski

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after having it up for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back in May, but just got a chance to put it together. It was easy to assemble, I was able to do it completely by myself. it seemed strong and sturdy, But one I got it together and took it outside. I found that it was starting to crack ;( I’m hoping that it will still hold up even though it is now cracked. But it is disappointing to see this, because I can’t send it back and it was not cheap $$$
customer_reviews.author: Martinique

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Patio Storage Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor, patio storage box. Not too big but plenty spacious for the pillows that I have for our patio chairs plus a few other things. The price was better than any other place I checked. The color and finish is great and stylish looking. Fairly easy to put together, our grandson and his friend (both age 12) put it together with the help and guidance of my husband. The directions were very misleading and almost no help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma M. Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This thing was so cheaply made that we had to saw a piece off to get the bottom and sides to “click” together. They never did click, but somehow it appears to be staying together — with visible gaps between the floor piece and the sides. I hope that doesn’t effect the water-proofness.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Large storage unit, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This container is relatively easy to assemble and seems to store quit a bit of yard equipment (I can easily fit all 4 foldable outdoor chairs as well as some bbq utensils and random garden tools). The container is made of plastic and feels just a bit flimsy, but sturdy enough for an outdoor storage unit. The 2 brackets on the lid (which you use for a lock if you have one) are made of plastic and don’t align perfectly, and I did accidentally break a small piece off during installation. Rain seems to run off the sides quite easily with built in water channels.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: After wrestling with a number of made in China u-assemble furniture products lately, I was dreading putting together this storage box. Well...guess what, it was super easy, and very quick to assemble. It is sturdy enough to sit on the edge and put your shoes on. We had a massive downpour yesterday, and it was the first test of the waterproof abilities. No problem at all, not a drop got inside. No gaps for bugs to crawl in either. We got this instead of a wooden storage container for our deck. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: reconrover

customer_reviews.title: Great storage chest.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built storage chest. It was easy to put together. It is waterproof. We have had some pretty heavy rain storms here in Tennessee since putting it together and have had no leaking at all. This sits on a uncovered deck open to full weather and has not leaked. It holds five full chair cushons with a little more space so you don't have to cramp them in. There are air holes in the undersides to allow good air flow and no chance for water to leak in. If needed. I would purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Storage Box
customer_reviews.text: Our son and his wife bought this for their kids to store toys at their home. They were so pleased with it that we bought one for when the grandkids are here. We are so glad that we did. I fits perfectly into our family room. It is stylish and has ample space for toy storage. I think that the best characteristic are the hydraulic lifters. They are perfect for keeping the lid raised when toys are being removed and stored; no accidental dropping of the lid here, even though it's not that heavy but it is still a great feature of this perfect toy storage box. It probably would make a good deck or pool box.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble Solo!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled alone and let me tell you, I am NOT handy but I had no problems! Took me less than a half hour. Instructions were clear and parts are labeled. You will need a screwdriver, but that's it. Knocked off one star because I expected the quality to be better for the price. It serves it's purpose and fits 6 thinner outdoor dining chair cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Waleed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids stuff
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an outdoor box that would hold my kids water table and other toys. Needed it to be big, not ugly and potentially waterproof. This one fits the water table (assembled) and a bunch of balls, toys and patio pillows. It’s quite large so check the measurements. I can’t speak to the waterproof, but we ended up getting a waterproof cover so we are all set. One note about the color, it’s kind of a faded grey (I almost think ira a very very light taupe), but my husband says it’s grey.
customer_reviews.author: Lovethefall123

customer_reviews.title: Great box - nice size, quality and look
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for our outdoor storage. We have the largest size which is great to keep kid toys in (toddler ages - kid lawnmower, little tykes gas pump, etc.) as well as patio supplies. The hinge prevents it from slamming shut on little fingers which is perfect for my 1 and 3 year old kids.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A

customer_reviews.title: Sent me the wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, I thought that the pic on the site was showing a lighter gray and the one I got was I guess a darker gray/brown color. Figured the pic was wrong. My son came over and said mom that’s def brown not gray. Now I can’t exchange it because the box is gone and they aren’t giving me the option to replace. Totally disgusted at this point.
customer_reviews.author: M. Call

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, large, weatherproof storage
customer_reviews.text: We use it for our chicken feed & bedding as well as outside toys (badminton & can jam). Everything has stayed perfectly dry. It is actually larger than I thought, which is fine because I needed a lot of deck storage. The hinges are large and sturdy. They keep the lid up while you get things out of the bin. It is sturdy enough to use as a seat. Several people could actually sit on it. My husband is 250lbs and sits on it without issue. The color hasn't faded at all and we have had it for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Mburkell0602

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best, not as great as the reviews imply.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of my Keter Borneo 110 Gallon Resin Outdoor Storage Bench and Deck Box is mediocre at best. Every piece had excess plastic that had to be trimmed. Every piece also had sharp edges in the plastic that had to be smoothed. In addition, the lid does not close tightly. It looks like a factory second to me. After all the good review, I expected better. I called Keter about it and they told me to take it up with Amazon. I called Amazon and their new policy seems to be return it or keep it, we don’t really care. I guess I will buy locally from now on.
customer_reviews.author: KC66

customer_reviews.title: Missing part and manufacturer won't return my emails or phone calls and neither does AMAZON!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this product and the assembly was quite easy. HOWEVER, I am missing an end cap piece from the lid of the deck box. I have contacted the manufacturer several times via emails and phone calls and have not gotten a response to date (5/26/2020). VERY DISSAPOINTING!!!!! I am considering returnng the product since there is NO customer support.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful box !
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome box are used it to store my outside cushions and pillows in it was perfect for an upright high top table with four chairs I was able to store away 4 cushions and 4 pillows And a little extra room after that very sturdy and well made ! Beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store patio chair/chaise lounge cushions. It holds 4-6 patio chair cushions. Easy assembly. Snaps together. Instructions are clear & part #'s are stamped into all sides. Did it myself in about 15 min and had hubby attach the hinge lid-lifting mechanisms. Feels very sturdy. One could use it for seating I suppose. Sits firmly on the concrete patio, lid can be locked if desired. Looks like no bugs can get inside-time will tell about that. Very happy with this product - so much so I ordered another for folding patio chairs & a foldable chaise lounge. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Red Rider

customer_reviews.title: Not grey. It’s black.
customer_reviews.text: This “Grey” box is not grey at all. The color is labeled as “Anthracite” on the box and it is black. If I wasn’t in such desperate need of storage I would return this. The color is not all all as pictured. I took a picture of a piece of the box on my Grey carpet to show the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Holm

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and good size but...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and was easy to put together. Seems solid and has a useful amount of space. The only thing is that the hardware was missing and a few pieces were broken, without the missing parts I cannot install the door. Not sure if the broken pieces are important for day to day use, guess I'll find out once I get the hardware. Great customer support in as they answered our call to the number provided. Keter indicated that I would receive replacement parts in 4 to 6 weeks. Guess I can give a follow up message once I get the parts and complete the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Negron

customer_reviews.title: Great product with poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for the grandkids outside toys. Easy to assemble with fairly understandable instructions. HOWEVER, the plastics molding process could use some serious improvement. Had to use a utility knife to clean up several joint areas and about slit my thumb peeling off the residual plastic from the feet. But again great product.
customer_reviews.author: Parson John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for back deck.
customer_reviews.text: Box came quickly and easy to assemble. I had measured previously for my cushions and everything fit inside perfectly! Lid is heavy and does not slam down which is nice. Also sturdy enough for extra seating. So impressed with it I immediately ordered a second one. Both look and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Royster

customer_reviews.title: Total Pile of Crap!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT get this. We got it for our camper...went to assemble it and got to the 3rd piece and it didn't fit at all. It was a full inch off from being able to snap in. In the process of trying to get it to fit the piece completely broke in half (pretty thin and flimsy). Going to seek a refund and the thing is going into the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Vandell

customer_reviews.title: warped, self assemble, garbage
customer_reviews.text: I literally received garbage. While I realize these items are injection molded plastics, this needs to be put at the BOTTOM of the quality list. Absolutely nothing "clicked" into place, as every longer piece was pretty warped. I saw all the "wonderful" 4 and 5 star reviews and took a chance. Don't make the same mistake I did. It was out of the box for about an hour before I threw in the towel. I don't return/review often, but this garbage took the cake. Amazon set to pick up tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Seth A.

customer_reviews.title: Very big storage box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our back patio to store cushions etc. It's huge! Lots of storage space. So far seems to be keeping things dry, but it is partially under our deck and not fully exposed. It was easy to assemble and all the parts were included and intact. Works for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Scout

customer_reviews.title: Looks GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this storage box. However, one panel had one of the places you hook it together broken and I just couldn't get it back in the box to return. Hopefully it will last years. Looks really neat beside my pool. And yes, I probably would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: different-alabama

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: 1- No Instruction sheet. Box was opened on the patio and no chance of losing the instruction sheet. 2- Part missing. Top-right, forward corner was missing. Box does not close correctly. 3- Very poorly made and cheap plastic (resin) construction.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Keter "Borneo" deck cushion box is top quality and was easy to put together. The instructions were few and simple. Basically, it was five pieces with lid-closure assembly and screws. One screwdriver did it all within five minutes. It is an excellent addition to store four large and three or four smaller cushions at night and during rain showers. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Retired teacher

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Suncast.
customer_reviews.text: Vastly easier to build and better quality than the Suncast one I bought and returned. I'm very satisfied with this. Only about 8 screws, snaps together easily, feels solid. The instructions are clear, the plastic molds are crisp and well done, and the parts feel solid. In contrast, the Suncast I had came with poorly photocopied instructions, required a ton of screws, had molding flaws, and fell apart when I moved it. I returned the Suncast one to Home Depot immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than you'd think
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. It's basically just snap together the large pieces then screw the lid on. Screw holes line up wilh the hardware well. Once it's together, my 240 lb butt can sit on it with someone next to me, and it doesn't feel like it's going to collapse. It's a little tall to use as a bench all the time. Haven't had any inclement weather to test that aspect yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Simple Design and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Assembling was a breeze. Huge storage and very sturdy even when two adults are sitting on it. Well designed and look forward to storing the deck chair cushions. Time will tell about being totally weather proof. Think for safety's sake, will put cushions inside a trash bag just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Received this today and it was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Received this today and it was super easy to put together. All holes and hardware matched up and although at one point in the directions it indicates a second person may be needed, this is not the case. It seems fairly sturdy and it has a lot of room. Although the lid closes firmly, I may explore putting some type of weather stripping on the lid to help lizards, spiders, etc from creeping in to any little crevice. The remaining joints overlap so I don't believe it will be easy for any creepy crawlies will be able to get in.....time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: W. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Great value and VERY EASY and quick to put together.  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Is just what we wanted and for the best price compared to others. It was unpacked and assembled in about a half hour. It holds six outdoor folding chairs with room to spare for other items. Highly recommend!! In terms of weather we really haven't tested bad weather weatherproof aspect as we live in mild Southern California. It holds up to sun very well. And when we hose down for cleaning outside it does not "leak" into the contents inside. So for us and our purposes it is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: The HR Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great product, with Amazon support.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is amazing. This is an easy to assemble item. Lid had small hole, was going to be 8 to 12 weeks from Kester. Had a full replacement from Amazon in days. Swapped the lid and returned. I can't say enough about amazons customer service. Keter, good product, cs not. Buy through Amazon to get the service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stanmrvan

customer_reviews.title: Great!!  gray may be just a bit darker than pictured, you decide  - FANTASTIC product though!!
customer_reviews.text: My sister purchased this product in a different color. It is very weatherproof! It assemblies fairly easily. However, the color pictured for the gray was not 100% accurate. I found that mine was possibly just a bit darker than pictured. I realize everyone's computer is different regarding colors, so that may be what caused the slight discrepancy . All in all a wonderful product, especially for the good deal that it is!
customer_reviews.author: Beckah

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great product support
customer_reviews.text: Quality products.I recently bought 2 more of these for outside storage/ extra seating. In fact I have a total of 5 Keter deck boxes. One of the deck boxes arrived without hardware. I called the number on the directions and they let me know the hinges were on back order , but they would send them to me as soon as they arrived. They came weeks earlier than I expected. I am happy with the product, but even happier with the product support!
customer_reviews.author: VHawk

customer_reviews.title: Missing  pieces
customer_reviews.text: Product was good but missing a piece. Amazon was kind enough to replace it for free and let me keep the old because once it goes together it does not come back apart. I received a new one free of charge and it was missing a different picture . So now I have two storage units that are missing pieces they still work and are water resistant as far as we know but I’m overall disappointed in the product but will use because of the deal Amazon gave me . Thank you Amazon for standing behind your product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Met Every Expectation
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble the whole unit by myself (mature female). It does need to be on solid surface for the lid to close properly. The storage is insane. And the unit looks nice. It is plastic and for the most part “click” assembly so if your looking for a high quality storage you will need to pay more. This unit has met every expectation and I’m so glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I live in a one bedroom apartment, not alot of space. I purchased this for my balcony which is pretty large, to store my Holiday Items. It was easy to assemble by myself & have had it outside for 2 wks now, it's great! No leaks from rain, no bugs. It can be locked (lock not included) and it looks nice! Plently of room inside for what I needed & I just purchased a cover for it - looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle-Rene'

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell...
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this came in a nice box...just a shame it was all torn on one side. All items were in the box and granted it was a very awkward box to maneuver. The box went together easily and it looks nice and roomy. It's a shame that none of these companies don't think of a way to put a shelf inside. I had a previous box that suited me for about 10+ years made by SUNCAST. Finally just got too worn out from the sun. Hope that the color of this box (dark brown) will suit the area that it is in.
customer_reviews.author: judith bates

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and uneven hinge opening speed.
customer_reviews.text: Put together very easy, but something seemed to be missing once it was fully assembled. That’s when I noticed the missing corner caps on one side of the box. Water will pool up in the legs now without them... or good. Also, the hydraulic hinge things open at different speeds so one opens super slow and the other super fast. This causes the lid to appear warped and crooked while opening. Called customer service and emailed.... no answer or response at all. Otherwise it is a beautiful and spacious deck box. Overall Not too happy
customer_reviews.author: RLD18

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, lovely and spacious
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and perfect. With the stay home orders, I've had to assemble adequate backyard sporting equipment to keep my two boys busy, but where to store? This storage bench is very spacious, a lovely addition to my patio, arrived quickly, had essentially perfect instructions on the manual and went together in ten minutes with one adult and a screwdriver. Absolutely brilliant and exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS STORAGE BOX FOR MY APARTMENT. I PUT IT IN MY LARGE LIVING ROOM.....IT FITS IN PERFECTLY WITH MY BROWN LEATHER FURNITURE. I PUT SOME THROW PILLOWS ON IT AND IT LOOKS GREAT....NOT OUT OF PLACE AT ALL! BEING AN APARTMENT DWELLER SPACE IS LIMITED BUT NOW I CAN PUT SO MUCH IN THIS STORAGE CHEST. WELLMADE/DURABLE AND SO EASY TO PUT TOGETHER. IT'S SNAP IN PUT TOGETHER CLIPS IS A CLEVER FEATURE......I PUT IT TOGETHER IN 10 MINUTES. THE HINGES U HAVE 2 SCREW IN BUT AGAIN FAIRLY EASY 2 DO. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. FAIR PRICE.....FAST DELIVERY. GREAT FOR EXTRA SEATING.
customer_reviews.author: Starmist Gal

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy weatherproof storage!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2nd floor apartment balcony! So much weatherproof storage (there is a balcony above mine but I placed this up against the rail and it gets all the wind and rain) and the perfect spot for a guest or two to sit. I can also stretch out on it, use it as a table when I’m in my favorite chair, and put my feet on it. It holds all of my cushions and a few other miscellaneous items (towel, bug spray, lighter, etc.). Best purchase I’ve made for my new outdoor space.
customer_reviews.author: Penni E. Just

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor storage.
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to store pool toys in that wasn't ugly. This looks nice, the grey color goes well with our outdoor area, and it's large enough to fit everything. It was easy to assemble (hubby did it by himself in about 5 minutes) and lightweight enough to carry outside easily. It seems sturdy, and so far has withstood wind and rain.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: For the price it seems cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. Feels cheap and can only hold 100 pounds inside asper the book. So cannot put too many tools in it. The locking mechanism is not strong enough I feel. There were 4 screw holes at the bottom but no instructions in the book about them I used my own screws and hopefully it will make it a bit stronger. Would have been muck better if they had used some metal/wood where you could screw the parts together much more securely. For the price you can build one from wood which might be much stronger than this cheap plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Box came and we put deck box together. No instructions were included. When we went to assemble kid on we found out that we didn’t receive any hardware . So maybe we can order it or do we need to did-assemble and send back?
customer_reviews.author: patricia boyers-brogle

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this storage unit. I was surprised at how large it was, but I started loading it and now I am delighted with the size!! I am an elderly person but was able to snap it together fairly easily by myself, once I got the hang of it. It's very sturdy and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Remmie123

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Given how expensive these can be this is great as a basic, pretty good looking outside storage box. It has a great storage size, perfect for seat cushions (we got it for a 6 seat set) and seems waterproof so far. Goes together pretty easy and looks fine. There is a slight warping to our lid so it needs a nudge to close properly but not major. Otherwise it’s grand.
customer_reviews.author: Census

customer_reviews.title: SUPER nice storage chest.
customer_reviews.text: This chest was SUPER easy to put together, it is REALLY nice looking. We have it next to a tree in our back yard and use it to store all of our summertime outdoor BBQ stuff, outdoor dishes, glassware. It is sturdy, classy looking, stays clean and dry inside even through rainstorms. We are extremely pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyann

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized - all plastic but the hinge for the lid and the screws
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice sized storage chest. I had a bit of trouble getting the sides to lock into one another. I had to use a screwdriver to jimmy things around a bit but finally got it. I put it together in less than 45 minutes. Not hard - just had to get it all aligned. There are air vents at the top so am hoping my stuff I will out into it will stay dry. Should keep the chipmunks out so they can no longer eat my patio cushions. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage for all the little gardening tools and patio pillows
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble! I was quite surprised at the size....it is going to hold everything! I find it sturdy enough to be used as a bench but probably wouldn't want 2 full sized adults on it. I love that it has hinges that keep the lid open for you! I've only had it a week so can't speak to the durability but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S

customer_reviews.title: nice storage box
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this storage box and the size was just right for all the cushions I have on my porch swing and it holds my portable tripod clothes line and basket of clothes pins. I did however caulk the vent holes in the bottom and glued pieces of screen over the vent openings at the top. I did not want bugs and spiders getting in. So far it works, the cushions stay dry and the box is bug and spider free.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Litzinger

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Perfect for storing my chair cushions on the deck. Easy to assemble. Opens and closes so smooth and easy. I sprayed the hinges with WD40 because I read in some other reviews that they sometimes rust. I will spray the hinges a couple times a year in hopes of preventing that issue. Even if they end up rusting eventually I’ll still be happy with this purchase. Great size and awesome price! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a little difficult for me to put together but not bad at all. It came with no instructions on how to put together but I was able to figure it out and I'm not handy at all. The box is very weatherproof had it for several months and nothing has gotten wet inside. It's also very sturdy I'm on the heavier side and I could sit on that without any trouble at all. Looks nice, I can also lock the box if I want to which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: LuciousLollyLateness

customer_reviews.title: Everything stays dry!  Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! My deck box holds tons of outdoor patio and swimming pool stuff. I have 7 beach towels, 4 small chair cushions, 2 dog beds, a lap blanket, a small pail of suntan lotion, a small pail of can coozies, a medium size tote holding our pool vacuum hose and I still a have more space! Everything stays dry. Lid never raises in storms. Holding up great in this Tennessee summer heat. No fading.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Elgas

customer_reviews.title: Top is misaligned
customer_reviews.text: When I put this together the top doesn't line up correctly with the bottom and therefore it doesn't close tightly. I tried multiple times to fix it - taking all the screws out, lining it up, and re-screwing - but it just doesn't work. I put a padlock on it to hold it shut, so hopefully animals won't be able to get in it. It's way too big and heavy to try and return, so I'm keeping it even though it's not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Try once... then try twice 😁
customer_reviews.text: I already had written a review regarding this item and was not happy but I am here to say that I left it lay out in the sun and everything even out shape- wise and went together quite easily. Therefore I am giving it a four-star.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It holds my whole 6 person patio cushion set along with love seat cushions. It looks nice, feels very sturdy, enough so that we do sit on it, and closes tight enough that it doesn't blow open during storms. The hydraulic lifts are a very nice touch too. My only cons are that the inside walls are a bit scrapy on the cushions, and that it is a bit darker than we thought (almost looks black, not brown).
customer_reviews.author: Brain Wash

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, just bought a SECOND one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over a year ago for pool toys. We left it outside all summer and winter and still looks great. We loved it so much I just ordered a second one for backyard items for grilling, fire pit, yard tools, etc. I was able to easily put it together by myself in 15 minutes or so. It’s very large, easily assembled, looks great, withstands with weather, didn’t fade and sturdy. We are very happy with these purchases.
customer_reviews.author: AGreene

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this storage bin. I was easy to assemble, very spacious. I don't know about weatherproof yet because we've had no weather but it appears to be tight and I have no reason to feel that it isn't. It was delivered as promised and it's a very good price. I did lots of shopping.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but had to comment that this box simply did not go together. One side would click in and then pop out when the other was pressed down. I am having to return it—thanks to the help of some excellent Amazon Prime folks—but pulling it back apart to re-pack it was almost not worth the money back! Probably the biggest piece of junk and disappointment I’ve purchased! Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This took a little longer to arrive than promised but it was packaged well, was pretty easy to assemble and included all parts. Very sturdy and I love that it has hinges that keep the lid from falling while open . I did not expect that! It’s very large and looks great on my patio! It was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: G from Knoxville

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bin but missing pieces!!
customer_reviews.text: REVISED- As of this post (7/7/18) I have received the missing parts for our box. The company responded promptly and we had our parts within 10 days. We are very happy with the service they provided. Again, box is great, very large. EXCELLENT PURCHASE! WORTH THE $$---THANK YOU! Great looking storage box, but pieces are missing. It was delivered today & put together right away but 2 caps are missing. If manufacturer sends replacement pieces or product, I will give this a 5 star review because it really is a nice looking box.
customer_reviews.author: Regina L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this deck box to store garden tools, extra potting soil, a hedger, and the list goes on. We were able to fit SO MUCH stuff in this box with room still left over. It's also very sturdy and a great spot to sit and watch my toddler as he plays in the yard. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My husband said this went together easier than any other deck box we have owned. It closes tightly, and we haven’t noticed water in it yet. It is really nice looking so you won’t mind having it out where it can be seen. I would not hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: PJ-Durham

customer_reviews.title: Everything as described
customer_reviews.text: I assembled myself with the exception of one step which recommends soliciting the help of someone. Very easy regardless. Very large. Fits seat cushions for 4 dining seats and 2 side chairs plus lumbar pillows. It’s raimed and everything is still in great condition. But a lock to keep securely shut
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This spacious piece was all it took to de-clutter my backyard. Pots, tools, balls, You name it, it fit. I am so pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Great Watertight Storage Chest
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a chest like this for some time that is of this Higher Quality, very easy to assemble, and works just as we wanted it to. Have had several rains, and with the added black plastic wrappers, everything stayed completely dry! Very nice esthetic to the design as well. Awesome company and excellent price point! Excellent choice and we couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: CHC ASSOCIATES ™

customer_reviews.title: Huge. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! It will fit outdoor couch cushions easily. The quality is really great too. Assembly took about 15 min by myself. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious storage.
customer_reviews.text: This storage container was the perfect size to fit 3 lounge chair cushions with pillows, & 4 chair seat cushions with 4 pillows. I use it to keep my cushions dry and protected during our monsoon season. Sometimes the rain comes down sideways and I was concerned that water might seep in the top edge. So far the container has kept everything dry. It was easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Pressler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my deck
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting one of these for several years. Picked on that was supposedly easy to assemble. I am 73 yrs old woman and I did it by myself. It would have been easier with a helper because of the size of the pieces you had to snap together but hey I did it. Lots of storage and seems waterproof. Haven't checked that yet
customer_reviews.author: JEANNE MONTGOMERY

customer_reviews.title: Great quality I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Nice but had to use box cutter to cut off some excess plastic so it would clamp together (no big deal but needed the extra tool) I would buy again easy to assemble best instructions I’ve seen in a long time . Very sturdy lock hole didn’t line up so I had to move it over for the lock to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Super easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly simple and frustration free to assemble. Good packaging of lightweight cardboard which was very easy to tear up for the recycling bin. Looks great and is large enough for a bunch of pool noodles, pool toys, kick boards, life vests, etc.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition and Space
customer_reviews.text: Was super easy to assemble. Took all of 20 minutes or so. Takes up more room than we expected on our deck, but after maneuvering some furniture it’s a perfect fit and also is more than enough space inside for our cushions. It’s rained a few times since we’ve had it and there hasn’t been a drip inside!
customer_reviews.author: Andre R

customer_reviews.title: I found a hole in top of chest after assembly
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor chest is not what I expected. It does not not seem as watertight as I had hoped. This was made more problematic by a small, irregularly shaped hole in middle of the chest's lid. This will be a real problem until I cover it with duct tape. That will be my solution since repackaging and return would be a real pain. I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps our recycling hidden
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically to hide our 2 large recycle bins on our back deck. It's been a perfect solution and looks great. We also have room to hold some of our daughter's summer toys for more easy access. I like having the lid that stays up on its own because it's really convenient when getting things in and out. We've had for over a year now and through the winter and has really held up nicely. This was easy to assemble overall, however, some parts we had a bit of a challenge fitting together. This is not to say that all of them would be like this. All came together in the end. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: missing a part
customer_reviews.text: When we received this & assembled, one of the corner top covers was missing. I wrote the shipper about it, & they sent a new one, but they sent the wrong piece again. I gave up. but other than that, I'm happy with it. It's been out on our deck for about a year, & no worse the wear. We live in Florida, & the sun is rather unforgiving on plastic products, so...
customer_reviews.author: Joyce60

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this box. It was very easy to assemble and went together fast. Love the hydraulic lid which prevents the lid from slamming down. Its huge and holds all our bird seed supplies. We also store our deck cleaning supplies and bucket and all our bbq supplies. Makes the patio look so organized.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: This box is very nice and durable. Arrived with minor damage
customer_reviews.text: This box is very nice and durable. Leaving 4 stars due to the broken back corner cover that was broken off and missing upon arrival. I called the 888 number from the paper in Tre package and they shipped the broken/missing part. Otherwise I’m very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: B. Apple

product_meta.title: Keter Borneo 110 Gallon Resin Deck Box-Organization and Storage for Patio Furniture Outdoor Cushions, Throw Pillows, Garden Tools and Pool Toys, Brown
product_meta.description:
Color:BrownKeep your garden tools and other essentials clean, dry and organized in style with the attractive Borneo deck box by Keter. With its polypropylene resin construction and spacious design, this storage box will meet and exceed all of your expectations. It doubles as a bench that easily accommodates two adults, so it adds comfort to any deck, patio or other outdoor area.This eye-catching deck storage box by Keter Plastic boasts a thoughtful design that includes many clever features. Because it is made out of polypropylene resin plastic material instead of natural wood, it won't rust, peel or dent. The manufacturer is so confident about the strength and durability of this plastic deck box that it backs it up with a two-year warranty. An automatic opening mechanism comes in handy for times when your hands are full, and its 110-gallon capacity ensures that it can comfortably accommodate a large variety of things. In addition to featuring first-rate craftsmanship and convenient features, the Borneo deck box is easy on the eyes. It boasts a rattan-style texture that lends it plenty of visual interest. In terms of style, it has contemporary flair that makes it suitable for all kinds of exterior design schemes. You'd be hard-pressed to find a more attractive outdoor storage option. 

Features & Benefits: 
• 110 gallon capacity 
• External dimensions: 51 inches x 27.6 inches x 24.6 inches 
• Internal dimensions: 45 inches x 23.4 inches x 21.3 inches 
• Lockable - Works with standard padlocks, which are sold separately 
• Durable - Strong, weather-resistant polypropylene construction prevents rusting, peeling and denting 
• Versatile - Use it to prevent clutter in the yard and to give family members and guests another place to sit 
• Automatic Opening - Mechanism pulls the top completely open with minimal effort 
• Attractive - A richly detailed rattan design imbues this stunning box with exceptional beauty that's sure to enhance the appearance of your patio, deck or other outdoor area.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: Exterior: 51 in. W x 27. 6 in. L x 24. 6 in. H / Interior: 45 in. W x 23. 4 in. L x 21. 3 in. H
IDEAL STORAGE: Generous and large 110 gallon storage capacity
RESIN CONSTRUCTION: It's made out of all weather-resistant resin with an appealing rattan-look texture
DURABLE AND STRONG: Weather-resistant polypropylene construction prevents rusting, peeling and denting - unlike real rattan
HYDRAULIC PISTONS: Easy lift and soft close mechanism pulls the top completely open and shut slowly with minimal effort - easy for kids to use and no smashed fingers
EXTRA SEATING: Provides comfortable bench seating with a weight capacity of 484 lbs.
VERSATILE STORAGE: Perfect place to store outdoor patio furniture cushions, outdoor toys, pool accessories, and beach towels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,399 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
